<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This abstract builder class defines a set of high-level steps for creating</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a923889e18d18e7f53ace52a374a70597"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a923889e18d18e7f53ace52a374a70597">~AbstractDependenceGraphBuilder</a>() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The main entry to the graph construction algorithm. It starts by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// creating nodes in increasing order of granularity and then</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// adds def-use and memory edges. As one of the final stages, it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// also creates pi-block nodes to facilitate codegen in transformations</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that use dependence graphs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The algorithmic complexity of this implementation is O(V^2 &#42; I^2), where V</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is the number of vertecies (nodes) and I is the number of instructions in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// each node. The total number of instructions, N, is equal to V &#42; I,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// therefore the worst-case time complexity is O(N^2). The average time</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// complexity is O((N^2)/2).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#aa6cc092387721c9933bb8ec763767c3d"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#aa6cc092387721c9933bb8ec763767c3d">populate</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a022f8d18fe9e9e880c51db47e2f372db">computeInstructionOrdinals</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a56732d193d3946d953c77a80e07ef61a">createFineGrainedNodes</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#ac76acbd497d18c7306f8120c6f11fb51">createDefUseEdges</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a9c4196edca24d644ff96e55945abd207">createMemoryDependencyEdges</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a008891a00a9aec8710d95ec82fd72196">createAndConnectRootNode</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#afba90b653098f15528a273ced632683a">createPiBlocks</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a2ca7af382aa1a34576aee355f364447c">sortNodesTopologically</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute ordinal numbers for each instruction and store them in a map for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// future look up. These ordinals are used to compute node ordinals which are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in turn used to order nodes that are part of a cycle.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Instruction ordinals are assigned based on lexical program order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a022f8d18fe9e9e880c51db47e2f372db">computeInstructionOrdinals</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create fine grained nodes. These are typically atomic nodes that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// consist of a single instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a56732d193d3946d953c77a80e07ef61a">createFineGrainedNodes</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Analyze the def-use chains and create edges from the nodes containing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// definitions to the nodes containing the uses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#ac76acbd497d18c7306f8120c6f11fb51">createDefUseEdges</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Analyze data dependencies that exist between memory loads or stores,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in the graph nodes and create edges between them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a9c4196edca24d644ff96e55945abd207">createMemoryDependencyEdges</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create a root node and add edges such that each node in the graph is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// reachable from the root.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a008891a00a9aec8710d95ec82fd72196">createAndConnectRootNode</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Apply graph abstraction to groups of nodes that belong to a strongly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// connected component of the graph to create larger compound nodes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// called pi-blocks. The purpose of this abstraction is to isolate sets of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// program elements that need to stay together during codegen and turn</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the dependence graph into an acyclic graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#afba90b653098f15528a273ced632683a">createPiBlocks</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Go through all the nodes in the graph and collapse any two nodes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#39;a&#39; and &#39;b&#39; if all of the following are true:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - the only edge from &#39;a&#39; is a def-use edge to &#39;b&#39; and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - the only edge to &#39;b&#39; is a def-use edge from &#39;a&#39; and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - there is no cyclic edge from &#39;b&#39; to &#39;a&#39; and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - all instructions in &#39;a&#39; and &#39;b&#39; belong to the same basic block and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - both &#39;a&#39; and &#39;b&#39; are simple (single or multi instruction) nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#aa58986a6df89ded5c86fc981ad2bf53c">simplify</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Topologically sort the graph nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a2ca7af382aa1a34576aee355f364447c">sortNodesTopologically</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">protected</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create the root node of the graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a6d0ad7c2f9c9bd805cf19a4b8936e6ae"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeType &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a6d0ad7c2f9c9bd805cf19a4b8936e6ae">createRootNode</a>() = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create an atomic node in the graph given a single instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
